abstract: Alabama-Birmingham running back Greg Bryant, who is in critical condition from gun shot wound, is recovering at St Mary's Medical Center in West Palm Beach, Fla.
lead_paragraph: Greg Bryant, the running back, was wounded in a shooting in South Florida, Blazers Coach Bill Clark said.

headline.main: University of Alabama-Birmingham Running Back Is Injured in Shooting
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | College Football; Alabama-Birmingham Running Back Is Shot

snippet: Greg Bryant, the running back, was wounded in a shooting in South Florida, Blazers Coach Bill Clark said.
